===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|順|sc=Jpan|tr=jun||order}} + {{m|ja|位|sc=Jpan|tr=i||rank}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じゅんい}}
# [[order]], [[rank]], [[precedence]]

====Derived terms====
* [[低順位]] (''teijun'i''): low priority
* [[優先順位]] (''yūsen jun'i''): order of precedence
* [[ファセット順位]] (''fasetto jun'i''): (''computing'') citation order
* [[実行優先順位]] (''jikkō yūsen jun'i''): (''computing'') dispatching priority
* [[低い優先順位]] (''hikui yūsen jun'i''): (''computing'') low priority
* [[自動優先順位グループ]] (''jidō yūsen jun'i gurūpu''): (''computing'') Automatic Priority Group
* [[射撃の優先順位]] (''shageki no yūsen jun'i''): priority of fires
* [[上限実行優先順位]] (''jōgen jikkō yūsen jun'i''): (''computing'') limit dispatching priority
